name: Frontier Settlers #Demo
description:
Costumize your units, collect resources, craft resources and build buildings.

This game is a demo of something that can become a great strategy game in the future. I have many more new features in the scope like, invaders, more buildings, more jobs, more resources, better graphics, better UI, dynamic paths, better environment, military placements, ships, hunger etc... 

Consider following me to get notified when a new version is released!
